title: FirstMeetText1
body:
You're LATE!
Well, anyway. You need to start working right now. Lots of clients summoning lately.
You know the drill: Just place the required items in the summoning circle.
You can pick up the items with [Space]
Drop them with [LMB] and if you're in a hurry, you can throw them with [RMB]
You can check your requirements with [Q] and click the send button to finish.
Now get to work! I can't get richer if you're lazy.
